attributes.action: make the British Medical Association carry out the necessary tests to establish whether the DORE Treatment programme is a legitimate cure for dyslexia/dyspraxia/ADHD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If DORE is a cure, it is a potentially life changing opportunity and parents should be able to chose the treatment without fear of building their children's and their own hopes up for nothing. It would be beneficial if the treatment could one day be available under the National Health Service. Perhaps this treatment might even help in the fight against some youth disorder and anti-social behaviour.
